allow: Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "SELECT DISTINCT parent_entity_type, child_entity_type, COUNT(*) as count FROM app.d_entity_id_map GROUP BY parent_entity_type, child_entity_type ORDER BY parent_entity_type, child_entity_type;")
Bash(for module in artifact biz client employee form office position project role task wiki worksite)

Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "SELECT table_name FROM information_schema.tables WHERE table_schema = ''''app'''' AND table_name LIKE ''''d_%'''' ORDER BY table_name;")
Bash(for table in d_project d_task d_wiki d_artifact d_business d_office d_client d_role d_position d_worksite)

Bash(do echo "=== $table ===" PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -t -c "
    SELECT column_name 
    FROM information_schema.columns 
    WHERE table_schema = ''''app'''' 
      AND table_name = ''''$table'''' 
      AND is_nullable = ''''NO''''
    ORDER BY ordinal_position;
  ")

Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "SELECT column_name FROM information_schema.columns WHERE table_schema = ''app'' AND table_name = ''d_project'' AND is_nullable = ''NO'' ORDER BY ordinal_position;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "SELECT id, name, slug, code FROM app.d_project WHERE name = ''Untitled'' ORDER BY created_ts DESC LIMIT 2;")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "\d app.d_artifact")
Bash(PGPASSWORD=app psql -h localhost -p 5434 -U app -d app -c "\d app.setting_datalabel_project_stage")
